attributes.action: Cancel the 2nd Referendum, as the first Referendum was a DEMOCRATIC REFERENDUM
attributes.additional_details: Over 1.4 million more people fully agreed to leave EUROPE
attributes.background:
We recently had a referendum and it is democratic one, which means it is law abiding.
The UK has been already asked to leave so a second referendum would not get us back in Europe.
Also David Cameron has resigned so would not be able to revoke his decision. Cancel the 2nd referendum
